title: Roadmap
description: Upcoming features and development milestones for Caddy Manager.
content:
• v0.1 – Public Beta
    • Initial release with multi-server management
    • Live Caddyfile editor & validation
    • API key management
    • Audit logging
    • Swagger-based API docs
  • v0.2 – Quality of Life
    • Role-based access control
    • Improved mobile UI
    • Server groupings/tags
    • Enhanced status monitoring
  • v1.0 – General Availability
    • Plugin marketplace
    • Automated backups
    • Multi-language support
    • Extensive documentation
